personal.name: Jesus Hernandez Chua Jr
personal.title: Process & Test Automation Specialist
personal.bio: IT Consultant with 15+ years of experience transforming complex business processes through intelligent automation. Specialized in test automation frameworks, process optimization, and quality assurance in enterprise environments.

experience.title: IT Consultant
experience.description: Leading automation initiatives and quality assurance strategies for enterprise-level applications. Focus on process optimization and test automation framework development.
achievements: Implemented comprehensive test automation frameworks, reducing manual testing time by 60%
Established automated quality assurance protocols for mission-critical applications
Led analysis and estimation of complex change requests with automation focus
Created automated reporting systems for real-time process monitoring
Developed automated testing environments and deployment procedures

experience.title: Business Process Architect
experience.description: Specialized in designing automated workflows for complex business processes and data migration projects. Focused on sprint management automation and UAT procedures.
achievements: Designed automated workflows for data migration and business process optimization
Automated sprint documentation and tracking systems, improving efficiency by 40%
Developed comprehensive User Acceptance Testing procedures and automation
Created self-updating documentation systems using VBA and web technologies
Established automated language translation processing workflows

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Developed automation solutions for technical documentation and process management. Created custom SharePoint applications and VBA automation tools.
achievements: Developed complex VBA macros for automated task processing and reporting
Built automated SharePoint workflow systems and custom web applications
Created automated documentation generation and update systems
Developed interactive training modules with automated assessment capabilities
Implemented process automation tools that increased team productivity

projects.title: Fluid Dynamics Simulation
projects.description: Advanced real-time fluid simulation with minimal abstraction layers, demonstrating complex algorithm optimization and performance monitoring techniques.

projects.title: Automated Color Testing
projects.description: Interactive color recognition system with automated performance tracking and user skill assessment, showcasing test automation principles.

projects.title: Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Automated data collection and analysis system comparing Forbes rankings with Wikipedia engagement metrics, featuring automated reporting.

projects.title: Physics Simulation Suite
projects.description: Collection of physics-based simulations including archery and golf games, demonstrating real-time optimization and performance monitoring.
